message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $800000. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on this product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $750000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product while also allowing us to reach an agreement.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose a counteroffer of $775000. I believe this price still reflects the product's value, and I'm confident we can come to an agreement.
